attributes.action: force the FA to sack Rob Styles as a football referee.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Rob Styles is an arrogant and incompetent referee who ruins football matches for 1000s of fans across the country because he believes that fans have come to the match to spend their hard earned money to watch him.  We the undersigned believe that Rob Styles is ruining football and should be sacked as a referee.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
